description: The concept of 'Women in STEM' focuses on the representation, challenges, and opportunities for women in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics fields. Despite progress in recent years, women continue to be underrepresented in STEM professions due to various factors such as gender stereotypes, bias, and lack of support.

subcategories.name: Caselet | Gender Disparities in STEM | 25 Min
Article | Stop Undervaluing Exceptional Women | 25 Min
TEDx Talk | Females in STEM - We Need More! | 10 Min
